species.name: Bengal Tiger
species.description: The Bengal tiger is the most numerous tiger subspecies, predominantly found in India.

species.name: Indian Elephant
species.description: The Indian elephant is one of three subspecies of the Asian elephant, primarily found in the forests of India.
species.habitat: Western Ghats, Eastern Himalayas, North-East India

species.name: Indian Rhino
species.description: The Indian rhinoceros is a large mammal found primarily in the grasslands of Assam and West Bengal.
species.habitat: Kaziranga National Park, Manas National Park

species.name: Snow Leopard
species.description: Snow leopards inhabit the high mountain ranges of the Himalayas and are elusive and hard to spot.

species.name: Indian Leopard
species.description: The Indian leopard is widely distributed across India and is known for its adaptability to various habitats.
species.habitat: Western Ghats, Eastern Ghats, Central India

species.name: Asiatic Lion
species.description: The Asiatic lion is found only in the Gir Forest of Gujarat, India, and is critically endangered.

species.name: Indian Bison (Gaur)
species.description: The Indian bison or gaur is the largest bovine species, found in the forests of India.
species.habitat: Western Ghats, Central India, Northeastern India

species.name: Sloth Bear
species.description: The sloth bear is native to the Indian subcontinent and is found in the forests of India.
species.habitat: Deciduous forests, Western and Eastern Ghats

species.name: Indian Wild Dog (Dhole)
species.description: The Indian wild dog, also known as the dhole, is a highly social and endangered species found in the forests of India.
species.habitat: Western Ghats, Central India, North-East India

species.name: Great Indian Bustard
species.description: The Great Indian Bustard is one of the heaviest flying birds, critically endangered, and found in Rajasthan.

species.name: Nilgiri Tahr
species.description: The Nilgiri tahr is an ungulate found in the high ranges of the Western Ghats.

species.name: Indian Pangolin
species.description: The Indian pangolin is a scaly anteater found in forests and grasslands across India.
species.habitat: Western Ghats, Eastern Ghats, Central India
